             </li>
             <li id="link16791697">
              <a id="link_16791697" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/silkspices" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16791697,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16791697});">
               Silk, Spices and World Trade
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18068429">
              <a id="link_18068429" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/tudorstuart" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18068429,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18068429});">
               Tudor-Stuart England
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24881019">
              <a id="link_24881019" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/urbanafrica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24881019,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24881019});">
               Urban Africa
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link20621416">
              <a id="link_20621416" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/womensamerica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20621416,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20621416});">
               Women's America
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22413959">
              <a id="link_22413959" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ww2eurocinema" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22413959,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22413959});">
               World War II in European Cinema
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10148967">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10148967">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10148967">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10148967">
          <div id="boxatt10148967" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12344561">
              <a id="link_12344561" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://history.paratext.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344561,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344561}); ">
               19th Century Masterfile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to Anglo-American nineteenth century newspapers, periodicals, books, and goverment documents
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24891541">
              <a id="link_24891541" href="http://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24891541,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24891541}); ">
               Chronicling America: Historic American Newspapers
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search America's historic newspaper pages from 1836-1922.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24989294">
              <a id="link_24989294" href="http://colonialnorthamerican.library.harvard.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24989294,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24989294}); ">
               Colonial North American Project at Harvard University
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This website provides access to some of the remarkable materials digitized as part of the ongoing, multi-year Colonial North American Project at Harvard University. When complete, the project will make available to the world digitized images of all known archival and manuscript materials in the Harvard Library that relate to 17th and 18th century North America.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344562">
              <a id="link_12344562" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344562,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344562}); ">
               Early English Books Online (EEBO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Digital facsimile page images of virtually every work printed in England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and British North America and works in English printed elsewhere from 1473-1700.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344563">
              <a id="link_12344563" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344563,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344563}); ">
               Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 180,000 titles (200,000 volumes) comprising books, pamphlets, essays, broadsides and more based on the English Short Title Catalogue Works published in the UK during the 18th century plus thousands from elsewhere. Content covers critical information in the fields of history, literature, religion, law, fine arts, science and more. Primarily in English but also includes other languages.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25450595">
              <a id="link_25450595" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/ethnicnewswatch?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25450595,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25450595}); ">
               Ethnic Newswatch
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ethnic NewsWatch includes newspapers, magazines, and journals of the ethnic and minority press, providing researchers access to essential, often overlooked perspectives.  The publications offer both national and regional coverage.  Ethnic NewsWatch is the only current database devoted to presenting multi-ethnic and multi-cultural publications in one resource.  Coverage for current newspapers begins in 1990 and is updated daily with new content.  Many of the titles are not found in any other aggregated resource. In addition, the historical file covering the years 1959-1989, offers a rare collection of over 30 full-text titles, focusing on African American, Hispanic American, and Native American presses from 1959-1989.  Unique perspectives are presented on the most important issues concerning ethnicities and minorities in the U.S. and Canada during the pivotal years of the 1960's, 1970's, and 1980's.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25563708">
              <a id="link_25563708" href="http://heinonline.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/HOL/Welcome" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25563708,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25563701}); ">
               HeinOnline Slavery in America and the World: History, Culture &amp; Law
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This HeinOnline collection brings together, for the first time, all known legal materials on slavery in the United States and the English-speaking world. This includes every statute passed by every colony and state on slavery, every federal statute dealing with slavery, and all reported state and federal cases on slavery. Our cases go into the 20th century, because long after slavery was ended, there were still court cases based on issues emanating from slavery.  The library has hundreds of pamphlets and books written about slaveryâ€”defending it, attacking it or simply analyzing it. We have gathered every English-language legal commentary on slavery published before 1920, which includes many essays and articles in obscure, hard-to-find journals in the United States and elsewhere. We have provided more than a thousand pamphlets and books on slavery from the 19th century. We have also included many modern histories of slavery.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23828666">
              <a id="link_23828666" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://voices.revealdigital.com/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23828666,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23828663}); ">
               Independent Voices
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Independent Voices is a four-year project to digitize over 1 million pages from the magazines, journals and newspapers of the alternative press archives of participating libraries. Includes (or will include) GI Underground Press, Women's Alternative Press, Native American Press, African American Press, Hispanic Press, Underground Campus Press, LGBT Press, Right-wing Press, and Literary "Little" Magazines.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344568">
              <a id="link_12344568" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344568,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24889044">
              <a id="link_24889044" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/55428" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24889044,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889044}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1857-1922 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24889045">
              <a id="link_24889045" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/45545" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24889045,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889045}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1923-2012 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25450594">
              <a id="link_25450594" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newspaperslibrary.proquest.com/?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25450594,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25450594}); ">
               newspapers.com (Pennsylvania Collection)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Newspapers.com Library Edition database provides searchable access to digital images of historical newspapers. Every part of every page is searchable, including local articles, advertisements, editorials, classified ads, and obituaries. Trexler Library has access to Newspapers.com Pennsylvania Collection which includes full or partial runs of 276 local newspapers published in Pennsylvania from 1769-2013.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344564">
              <a id="link_12344564" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.accessible.com/accessible/preLog" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344564,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344564}); ">
               Pennsylvania Gazette
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Early American paper of record, 1728-1800.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344565">
              <a id="link_12344565" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344565,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344566">
              <a id="link_12344566" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=SAS" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344566,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344566}); ">
               Slavery &amp; Anti-Slavery
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains: "Part I: Debates over Slavery and Abolition"; "Part II: Slave Trade in the Atlantic World"; "Part III: The Institution of Slavery"; "Part IV: The Age of Emancipation."  Includes collections on the transatlantic slave trade and the global movement for the abolition of slavery from the sixteenth through the nineteenth century. Incorporates documents from the United States and Europe, as well as other parts of the world. In addition to newspaper collections and books published in the antebellum era, Slavery and Anti-Slavery contains documents from several archives originally available only on microfilm. Includes 10,761 books, 131 serials, 32 manuscript collections and 377 supreme court records and brief.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25450435">
              <a id="link_25450435" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://lado.alexanderstreet.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25450435,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25251332}); ">
               Social and Cultural History: Letters and Diaries Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of thousands of private writings, personal narratives, interviews and more of people from diverse ethnic and social groups from 1550 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344567">
              <a id="link_12344567" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344567,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344567}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2897457" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63914">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" title="View Profile">
              <img alt="Profile Image" border="0" src="//lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/profiles/63914/kelly_2_feb_2013.jpg" class="profile_image_align profileimage" style="max-width:140px;" />
             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              484-664-3602
              <br />
              <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
               Send Email
              </a>
              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" id="profile_link">
               Profile &amp; Guides
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Subjects:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/cat.php?search_cat=Humanities+and+Business&amp;mode=profile_search">
               Humanities and Business
              </a>
             </div>
